    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Oblikovanje kipa iz papirja</string>
            <string language="en">Creating statue from paper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herstellen der Statue vom Papier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Créer la statue du papier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Criando a estátua do papel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Creazione della statua da carta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημιουργία του αγάλματος από το έγγραφο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Crear la estatua del papel</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Izdelki učencev so bili zelo izvirni in kvalitetno narejeni. Ni nujno, da je kip vedno iz gline, tudi iz papirja se da marsikaj ustvariti.</string>
            <string language="en">How to organize workshop where pupils are making statues out of paper.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kip</string>
            <string language="en">statue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">papir</string>
            <string language="en">paper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">material</string>
            <string language="en">material</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man Werkstatt organisiert, in der Pupillen 
Statuen aus Papier heraus bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment organiser l'atelier où les pupilles 
fabriquent des statues à partir de le papier.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como organizar a oficina onde as pupilas estão 
fazendo estátuas fora do papel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come organizzare seminario in cui le pupille 
stanno facendo le statue da carta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να οργανώσει το εργαστήριο όπου οι μαθητές 
κάνουν τα αγάλματα από το έγγραφο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo ordenar el taller en donde las pupilas 
están haciendo las estatuas fuera del papel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Papier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
